review: It would easily be a five star review, if not for the slow interface. YouTube is painfully slow transitioning between submenus. The main interface is slow, too. That said, a brilliant little device that has been the perfect (well a faster one preferred) solution.

review: Love Roku.  I am an Apple fan but Roku has it all over Apple TV's. This is probable the way things will go in the future. So many channels to chose from.  The only difference between this and the Roku 3 is there is no games and no earphone in the remote.  You can like Apple TV download the app on smartphone to use your phone as a remote
